transcript:
walked slowly and languidly past thousands of eyes which were starting from their sockets to watch their chief. On reaching the third company he suddenly stopped. His suite, not having expected this, involuntarily came closer to him. 
"Ah, Tim6khinl" said he, recognizing the red-nosed captain who had been reprimanded on account of the blue greatcoat. 
One would have thought it impossible for a man to stretch himself more than Tim6khin had done when he was reprimanded by the regimental co
